description:
Eriko heads to the beach to get her mind off of Miu`s surprising announcement. After a chance encounter with some of the idols she defeated, Eriko regains her fighting spirit - and her appetite!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Swimsuit Vacation Filled with Idols! And Battles, Too!
Doki, Idol Darake no Mizugi Vacance! Battle mo Aru yo
Vacances d`idols en bikini, un battle en prime !
ドキッ, アイドルだらけの水着バカンス! バトルもあるよ
